DOC.brief_title: Mesh Reinforcement During Temporary Stoma Closure After Sphincter-Saving Rectal Cancer Surgery
DOC.detailed_description: This study aim assess long-term result incisional hernia-prophylactic mesh placement stoma reversal TME rectal cancer . Patients randomize 3 group : mesh , synthetic mesh ( Parietex , Covidien ) , biologic mesh ( Cellis , Meccelis ) . Meshes place retromuscular position divert ileostomy closure . Primary endpoint radiological incisional hernia rate , assess CT-scan , end follow-up Secondary endpoint include postoperative morbidity , postoperative pain , postoperative quality life , long-term clinical incisional hernia rate .
